name: Basketball 3D Shoot Out Free Touch Ball Fly Top Air Action Arcade Game
name_original: Basketball 3D Shoot Out Free Touch Ball Fly Top Air Action Arcade Game
description:
Basketball 3D Shootout free game is the best hooping balls sport race arcade game fun.

Basketball 3D Shootout is a fun outdoor sports now as pocket mobile game. Aim, focus, hoop and shot towards the nets for higher level points to win the medal trophy. Realistic 3D physics of ball hit, bounces, misses etc. Adrenaline game music with dynamic random camera angles. Need new color of the ball? You got it. Option to play in night mode or day mode as well as choice to turn off background music. Learn to be NBA basketball pro by practicing more and unlocking the various levels of the game. Ready! Set! Go.!!

Features:

* Touch, tap and flick the ball towards the nets
* Ball motion sensor tilt and acceleration of ball object gravity depends on various camera angles modes of play and force of flicking direction.
* Unlock more levels for higher medal trophy
* Day & Night mode
* Choice of ball color
* Brag your profile scores with others
* Optionally turn off game music audio on/off.
* Racing with the limited balls for more points at each level.
* Fun arcade game for all ages including kids

Best extreme street basket ball outdoor park game now in pocket mobile.

Please note: Needs iOS high end dual core processors or above which support Open GL 2.0 to render 3D graphics of the game.
